001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.logging;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.enums.WebElementAction;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.FourConsumer;
005import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
006import java.util.Collections;
007import java.util.Map;
008import lombok.Getter;
009import org.openqa.selenium.ElementClickInterceptedException;
010import org.openqa.selenium.ElementNotInteractableException;
011import org.openqa.selenium.InvalidSelectorException;
012import org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException;
013import org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException;
014import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
015import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
016
017/**
018 * Enum representing different exception logging scenarios for Selenium WebDriver actions.
019 *
020 * <p>Each entry in the enum defines a WebDriver or WebElement action along with
021 * a mapping of exception types to their corresponding logging functions.
022 * This facilitates structured logging when exceptions occur during UI interactions.
023 *
024 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
025 */
026@Getter
027public enum ExceptionLogging {
028   /**
029    * Logs exceptions when attempting to find a single element from the root WebDriver.
030    */
031   FIND_ELEMENT_FROM_ROOT(WebDriver.class, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENT,
032         Map.of(NoSuchElementException.class, LoggingFunctions::logFindElementFromRootNoSuchElementException)),
033
034   /**
035    * Logs exceptions when attempting to find multiple elements from the root WebDriver.
036    */
037   FIND_ELEMENTS_FROM_ROOT(WebDriver.class, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENTS,
038         Map.of(NoSuchElementException.class, LoggingFunctions::logFindElementFromRootNoSuchElementException)),
039
040   /**
041    * Logs exceptions when attempting to find a single element within another WebElement.
042    */
043   FIND_ELEMENT_FROM_ELEMENT(WebElement.class, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENT,
044         Map.of(NoSuchElementException.class, LoggingFunctions::logNoSuchElementException)),
045
046   /**
047    * Logs exceptions when attempting to find multiple elements within another WebElement.
048    */
049   FIND_ELEMENTS_FROM_ELEMENT(WebElement.class, WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENTS,
050         Map.of(NoSuchElementException.class, LoggingFunctions::logNoSuchElementException)),
051
052   /**
053    * Logs exceptions related to clicking a WebElement, including various interaction failures.
054    */
055   CLICK(WebElement.class, WebElementAction.CLICK,
056         Map.of(NoSuchElementException.class, LoggingFunctions::logNoSuchElementException,
057               ElementNotInteractableException.class, LoggingFunctions::logElementNotInteractableException,
058               InvalidSelectorException.class, LoggingFunctions::logClickInvalidSelectorException,
059               ElementClickInterceptedException.class, LoggingFunctions::logElementClickInterceptedException,
060               TimeoutException.class, LoggingFunctions::logClickTimeoutException)),
061
062   /**
063    * Logs exceptions related to sending keys to a WebElement.
064    */
065   SEND_KEYS(WebElement.class, WebElementAction.SEND_KEYS,
066         Map.of(NoSuchElementException.class, LoggingFunctions::logNoSuchElementException,
067               ElementNotInteractableException.class, LoggingFunctions::logElementNotInteractableException,
068               ElementClickInterceptedException.class, LoggingFunctions::logElementClickInterceptedException)),
069
070   /**
071    * Logs exceptions related to submitting a WebElement.
072    */
073   SUBMIT(WebElement.class, WebElementAction.SUBMIT,
074         Map.of(NoSuchElementException.class, LoggingFunctions::logNoSuchElementException,
075               ElementNotInteractableException.class, LoggingFunctions::logElementNotInteractableException));
076
077   /**
078    * The class type this exception logging applies to (WebDriver or WebElement).
079    */
080   private final Class<?> targetClass;
081
082   /**
083    * The WebElementAction associated with this exception logging case.
084    */
085   private final WebElementAction action;
086
087   /**
088    * A mapping of exception types to their respective logging functions.
089    */
090   private final Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, FourConsumer<Object, WebElementAction, Object[],
091         InvocationTargetException>> exceptionLoggingMap;
092
093   /**
094    * Constructs an exception logging entry for a given action and exception mapping.
095    *
096    * @param targetClass         The class type this logging applies to (WebDriver or WebElement).
097    * @param action              The WebElementAction associated with this exception logging case.
098    * @param exceptionLoggingMap A map of exception classes to their respective logging functions.
099    */
100   ExceptionLogging(final Class<?> targetClass, final WebElementAction action,
101         Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, FourConsumer<Object, WebElementAction, Object[],
102               InvocationTargetException>> exceptionLoggingMap) {
103      this.targetClass = targetClass;
104      this.action = action;
105      this.exceptionLoggingMap = exceptionLoggingMap;
106   }
107
108
109   public Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, FourConsumer<Object, WebElementAction, Object[],
110         InvocationTargetException>> getExceptionLoggingMap() {
111      return Collections.unmodifiableMap(exceptionLoggingMap);
112   }
113}
114
115
116
